argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mattposm.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | mattposm.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | mattposm.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` A ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) = ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> R e. CRing ) |
| 7 | 1, 2 | #P_matrcl | |- ( Y e. B -> ( N e. Fin /\ R e. _V ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_simpld | |- ( Y e. B -> N e. Fin ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> N e. Fin ) |
| 10 | 1, 5, 2 | #P_matbas2i | |- ( X e. B -> X e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> X e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 5, 2 | #P_matbas2i | |- ( Y e. B -> Y e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> Y e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) ) |
| 14 | 4, 4, 5, 6, 9, 9, 9, 11, 13 | #P_mamutpos | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> tpos ( X ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) Y ) = ( tpos Y ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) tpos X ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 4 | #P_matmulr | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) = ( .r ` A ) ) |
| 16 | 9, 6, 15 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) = ( .r ` A ) ) |
| 17 | 16, 3 | #P_syl6reqr | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> .x. = ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .x. Y ) = ( X ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) Y ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_tposeqd | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> tpos ( X .x. Y ) = tpos ( X ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) Y ) ) |
| 20 | 17 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( tpos Y .x. tpos X ) = ( tpos Y ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) tpos X ) ) |
| 21 | 14, 19, 20 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> tpos ( X .x. Y ) = ( tpos Y .x. tpos X ) ) |
